## About Me

### Brief Introduction

I am a second year MPH student in [Health Policy and Management](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/academics/departments/health-policy-and-management) Department of Mailman School of Public Health at [Columbia University](https://www.columbia.edu/). I currently live in Washington Heights of New York City.
